name: TikTakToe (beProsto)
description:
READ BEFORE YOU RUN THE GAME: Before running the game, you need to start the server, here. You can close the tab after running the server, remember to tell your friend that you did it already, and that they don't need to! :D

The game is based on the Tic Tac Toe minigame from Amanita Design's Machinarium.
The game is played on a 10 x 10 grid, the first player to put a line of 5 symbols wins.
The lines can be horizontal, vertical and crossed, just like in the normal Tic Tac Toe game!

I hope You have fun playing the game along with Your friends! :D
